snippet: Matt Barnes tossed in a desperation 3-pointer from just inside midcourt with 1.1 seconds left to give Memphis Grizzles a 93-92 victory at Detroit.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Memphis Grizzles defeat Detroit Pistons, 93-92; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Matt Barnes tossed in a desperation 3-pointer from just inside midcourt with 1.1 seconds left to give Memphis Grizzles a 93-92 victory at Detroit.

headline.main: Grizzlies’ Halfcourt Shot Seals Victory Over the Pistons
headline.print_headline: Grizzlies’ Halfcourt Shot Seals Victory Over the Pistons
